title: System Collapsed During Traffic Spike
shortDescription: System failed to handle sudden increase in user requests, leading to complete outage

title: Database Failed First
shortDescription: Database health dropped before other services due to excessive queries or lack of caching

title: System Became Slow Under Load
shortDescription: Response times degraded significantly as traffic increased, causing poor user experience

title: Costs Increased Too Fast
shortDescription: Infrastructure spending exceeded budget due to aggressive scaling or over-provisioning

title: Security Attack Caused Failure
shortDescription: System failed due to malicious traffic overwhelming resources without proper protection

title: System Stable But Score Low
shortDescription: System remained online but scored poorly due to inefficient resource usage or high costs

title: Queue Overflow Under Pressure
shortDescription: Message queue filled up faster than consumers could process, causing request drops
